description: Postcss version of px2rpx px自动缩小倍数
readme:
把px scale value 几倍 
# postcss-px2scale

## 自定把px值缩小指定倍数 默认缩小3倍

### how use it ？
`
"plugins": {
      "postcss-px2scale": {scaleUnit: 3}
       "exclude": /node_modules|folder_name/i
    }
`
### 0.2.0

* add exclude pragram
